abstract: Which financial firms are primed to fare well as the markets continue to tremble? According to Fidelity Investments‘ flagship Magellan fund, they’re Goldman Sachs and the American International Group.
lead_paragraph: Which financial firms are primed to fare well as the markets continue to tremble? According to Fidelity Investments‘ flagship Magellan fund, they’re Goldman Sachs and the American International Group.

headline.main: Fidelity Shows Its Hand on Goldman, Citi, JPMorgan
